attributes.action: Politicians fined in the wake of the 'PartyGate' revelations must resign
attributes.additional_details: Because trust in the electoral system and democratic engagement is increasingly jeopardised by evidence that politicians can no longer be forced to resign no matter what
attributes.background: Restore the perception of political honesty and public accountability - there must not be a clear suggestion that there is a different law applicable to politicians and office holders compared to the general public

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
